column5: Fishing was good but my trip back and forth on lake wasn't very nice.Pretty much all slush for 2 1/2 miles.Thats about it for me and my sled.Going to wait till ice lifts and use ATV for last few outings.Temps today 16c and snow is melting fast
[QUOTE=Eckohlt;6731213]Only one speed in slush,,,,,,,,,WFO!!About half throttle for my 800.

A friend and I went lake trout fishing on Monday. It was good running on the snowmobiles until we got to the trout lake, it was slush, we stood in water all day. When we headed back the 15 miles of lake riding that was good in the morning had turned to all slush and water, it was a wet ride home. That was the last snowmobile ride of the season. We still have 2 1/2' of good ice on my home lake, but the next time I go fishing it will be in a side X side or 4-wheeler.
Yup.mine is going to get put away today.i was lucky that the spot I usually fish was hard so it was dry.
